markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 324 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodline** [Shadow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=14) **Deities** [Andoletta](/Deities.aspx?ID=112), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=85) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Area** 30-foot emanation **Target** up to 2 creatures --- You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save. **Critical Success** The target can teleport if it wants, but it chooses the destination within range.
**Success** The target is unaffected.
**Failure** You teleport the target and choose its destination. --- **Heightened (+1)** The number of targets increases by 1.
name: Collective Transposition
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 324 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Shadow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=14)

**Deities**
[Andoletta](/Deities.aspx?ID=112), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=85)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Area** 30-foot emanation

**Target** up to 2 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Teleport up to two creatures to new positions near you.
</summary>
summary: Teleport up to two creatures to new positions near you.
summary_markdown: Teleport up to two creatures to new positions near you.
text: Collective Transposition Source Core Rulebook pg. 324 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodline Shadow Deities Andoletta, Bolka Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 30-foot emanation Target up to 2 creatures --- You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save. Critical Success The target can teleport if it wants, but it chooses the destination within range. Success The target is unaffected. Failure You teleport the target and choose its destination. --- Heightened (+1) The number of targets increases by 1.
